PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-21692002-12-12,  CCRA,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS to the extent of making them consistent with previous amendments to the Income Tax Act, by reducing filing requirements in respect of the Home Buyers' Plan and the Lifelong Learning Plan, by allowing information returns, such as T5 statements, to be filed electronically and by updating the list of universities outside Canada that qualify for tax-deductible charitable donations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0005 Publication Date: 2003-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
